generatedTitle: what was the role of the overseer in roman agriculture

extractFactDictList.question: What civilization was one of the most powerful and influential in history?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Roman Empire was one of the most powerful and influential civilizations in history, with a vast agricultural sector that relied heavily on slave labor.

extractFactDictList.question: What type of farm was the slave overseer?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The role of the slave foreman or overseer on a Roman farm was crucial in the efficient management and operation of the farm.

extractFactDictList.question: What type of agricultural sector will we discuss?
extractFactDictList.sentence: We will also discuss the impact of their role on the Roman agricultural sector and the broader society.
